about_text: I'm Felipe Santarosa, a backend developer focused on creating efficient, scalable, and maintainable solutions. I have experience in APIs, systems integration, and performance optimization, always seeking to write clean code and apply best practices.
skills_secondary_text: React, React Native, HTML, CSS, Styled Components, CSS-in-JS, TypeORM, Fastify, Zod, Linux, Marketplace, Chatbot, TDD, DDD, creation of administrative panels.

projects.title: Chatbot for Compounding Pharmacies
projects.description: I participated in a project where my team and I built a chatbot system from scratch to meet the demands of partner compounding pharmacies. The project was a partnership with one of the largest pharmacy chains in SÃ£o Paulo.
challenges: Identification of data in strings, trying to extract relevant information for each triage step.
Identification of when a user wanted to speak with an attendant.
Data caching to avoid repetitive questions to the client.
Testing a system that was internally structured.

projects.title: Administrative/Marketplace Website
projects.description: I participated in a project where I created administrative screens, internal library components (buttons, modals, selectors, etc.), and integration with partner store APIs.
challenges: Creating an intuitive and responsive user interface.
Ensuring performance and scalability of the application.

projects.title: Mobile App for Farm Rentals
projects.description: I participated in a project where my team and I built a rental system for farms, similar to platforms like Airbnb. With a web administrative panel and a React Native application.
challenges: Creating an intuitive and responsive user interface.
Integration with geolocation services to display nearby properties.
